Description: Copper alloy, 17th-century, anonymous civic coin of Shiraz (?). Obverse: Lion walking to right. Reverse: Persian inscription.
Curator's comments: Found in an unnumbered box of miscellaneous Masson collection ornaments and fragments, now designated 'Box 9'.
Bibliographic references: Valentine 1911 / Modern Copper Coins of the Muhammadan States of Turkey, Persia, Egypt, Afghanistan, Morocco, Tripoli, Tunis, etc (pp.144-5, no.102.) (?)
